type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.CheckBox
type.summary: Represents a class, which manages the settings of the control .

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.CheckBox.CheckSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the size of the marker in the "enabled" state for the control .
property.value: The size of the marker when state = enabled. The default value is 10 px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.CheckBox.GetCheckSize(System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The size of the marker when state = enabled.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.CheckBox.SetCheckSize(System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The size of the marker when state = enabled.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
